entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this morning. Showers beginning this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the water. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers ending this evening then cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Monday 17 April 2023
